name: @genx/server
description: Gen-X web application framework based on koa for node.js

scripts.test:all: npm run test:spec && npm run test:mocha
scripts.test: npm run build:test && npm run test:all
scripts.cover: npm run build:test && npm run cover:unit && npm run cover:integration && npm run cover:report
scripts.build: npm run bulid:clean && NODE_ENV=development babel src -d lib --copy-files && del lib/**/__test__
scripts.build:prod: npm run bulid:clean && NODE_ENV=production babel src -d lib --copy-files && del lib/**/__test__
scripts.build:test: npm run bulid:clean && NODE_ENV=test babel src -d lib --copy-files && del lib/**/__test__
scripts.sample: npm run build && cd test/sample/app_modules/gateway && npm run build && cd ../.. && node index
scripts.sample:sso:oolong: cd test/sample/app_modules/sso && npm run oolong:build && npm run oolong:migrate
scripts.sample:gateway:oolong: cd test/sample/app_modules/gateway && npm run oolong:build && npm run oolong:migrate

author: Rockie Guo <rockie@kitmi.com.au>
